com.darly.dview.widget.image

类 SmoothImageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.ImageView
        • com.darly.dview.widget.image.SmoothImageView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class SmoothImageView
extends android.widget.ImageView
    2d平滑变化的显示图片的ImageView 仅限于用于:从一个ScaleType==CENTER_CROP的ImageView，切换到另一个ScaleType= FIT_CENTER的ImageView，或者反之 (当然，得使用同样的图片最好)
    版本:
    1.0/com.darly.dview.widget.image Copyright (c) 2017 Organization D.L. zhangyuhui All rights reserved.
    作者:
    Darly/张宇辉/2017/11/23 14:49
